metadata.purpose: Proof-of-concept image generation to validate approach for Native American construction foreman character
metadata.cultural_note: Navajo/Diné cultural elements shown naturally and respectfully — turquoise jewelry, Navajo-pattern textiles, connection to reservation. No stereotypical imagery (headdresses, face paint, etc.)

scenes.title: Pre-Dawn Bedroom
scenes.lighting: complete darkness, faint blue glow from alarm clock
scenes.description: A 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin and short black hair lies asleep in a queen bed under a white sheet. A Navajo-pattern wool blanket in red, black, and gray geometric designs is draped across the foot of the bed. His wife sleeps beside him. On the wooden nightstand, a digital alarm clock glows blue at 4:59. A small ceramic tray holds a turquoise pendant necklace. A ceiling fan turns slowly. The window shows no hint of sunrise yet.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, muscular build, sleeping in queen bed, white sheet, Navajo-pattern wool blanket (red black gray geometric) at foot of bed, wife sleeping beside him, wooden nightstand with blue glowing alarm clock, turquoise necklace in ceramic tray, ceiling fan above, dark pre-dawn bedroom, ranch-style house, warm earth tones
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bright room, daylight, stereotypical headdress, face paint, inappropriate

scenes.title: Picking Up the Turquoise Necklace
scenes.description: David picks up his turquoise pendant necklace from the small ceramic tray on the nightstand. The pendant is a smooth oval turquoise stone, blue-green with thin dark veins, set in a simple sterling silver bezel on a thin silver chain. His grandmother gave it to him. He holds it briefly in his calloused palm, then slips the chain over his head. The alarm clock reads 5:03 beside the now-empty tray.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of 35-year-old Native American man's calloused hand picking up turquoise pendant necklace from ceramic tray on wooden nightstand, smooth oval turquoise stone in sterling silver bezel, thin silver chain, dark brown copper-toned skin, blue alarm clock glow, pre-dawn bedroom, meaningful family heirloom moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bright room, multiple necklaces, elaborate jewelry, inappropriate

scenes.title: Lacing Up Work Boots
scenes.camera_view: at bed, looking down at boots
scenes.description: David sits on the edge of the bed lacing up his brown leather steel-toe work boots. The boots are heavy, deeply creased and scuffed from daily construction use. He pulls the thick laces tight, wrapping them around the top hooks, and ties a firm double knot. He wears tan cargo pants and a dark green flannel shirt. The Navajo-pattern blanket is visible on the bed behind him. The hardwood floor shows beneath his feet.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, muscular stocky build, sitting on edge of queen bed, lacing up brown leather steel-toe work boots, tan cargo pants, dark green flannel shirt, thick boot laces, heavy worn boots, Navajo-pattern blanket visible on bed, hardwood floor, soft warm lamp light, getting ready for work
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, new clean boots, casual shoes, bright light, inappropriate

scenes.title: Picking Up Safety Vest and Hard Hat
scenes.description: David lifts the orange reflective safety vest off its hook inside the closet. The vest is bright construction orange with silver-gray reflective stripes. He drapes it over his arm. From the top shelf, he grabs his yellow hard hat with a company logo sticker and an American flag sticker. Safety glasses are hooked on the vest pocket. The closet shows work clothes hanging: cargo pants, flannel shirts, the tool belt on a hook.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, muscular build, picking up orange reflective safety vest from closet hook, yellow hard hat from top shelf, company logo and American flag stickers on hard hat, safety glasses hooked on vest, closet showing work clothes and tool belt, soft bedroom lamp light, construction worker getting ready
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, office clothes, suit, bright outdoor light, inappropriate

scenes.title: Goodbye Kiss — Turning Off Lamp
scenes.description: David leans over the bed and pulls the white sheet up over Sarah's shoulder, pressing a light kiss to her forehead. She does not wake. The alarm clock reads 5:24. The Navajo-pattern blanket is a warm geometric shape at the foot of the bed. The framed family photo on the dresser and the desert landscape painting are barely visible in the pre-dawn gray. He has his safety gear in hand, ready to leave for the construction site.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, wearing work clothes, leaning over queen bed, gently pulling sheet over sleeping wife's shoulder, tender goodbye kiss on forehead, alarm clock glowing blue, Navajo-pattern blanket at foot of bed, pre-dawn gray light, safety vest and hard hat in other hand, leaving for work, gentle loving moment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, bright room, wife awake, inappropriate, suggestive

scenes.title: Looking in the Mirror
scenes.description: David stands at the bathroom sink and looks at himself in the large mirror. His reflection shows a 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair mussed from sleep, strong jaw, broad nose, tired dark brown eyes. The turquoise pendant hangs against his gray t-shirt. Behind his reflection, the beige shower curtain and towel bar are visible. A small scratch on his forearm from a nail on yesterday's job site is healing.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair mussed from sleep, strong jaw, broad nose, tired dark brown eyes, looking at reflection in large bathroom mirror, turquoise pendant on gray t-shirt, bright overhead bathroom light, beige shower curtain behind, simple functional bathroom, morning routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, dark bathroom, fancy bathroom, wide awake expression, inappropriate

scenes.title: Shaving
scenes.description: David draws the razor down his cheek in a smooth stroke, cutting through shaving cream and stubble. A clean stripe of dark brown skin appears. He rinses the razor under the faucet, tapping it against the basin edge. His free hand stretches the skin taut for a closer shave. The basin has swirls of white foam and dark stubble. His expression is one of quiet concentration.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, shaving face with razor, white shaving cream on jaw and chin, clean stripe of shaved skin visible, rinsing razor under faucet, mirror reflection, sink basin with foam and stubble, bright bathroom light, concentrated expression, morning grooming routine
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, beard, electric razor, dark room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Applying Sunscreen
scenes.description: David squeezes sunscreen onto his fingertips and rubs it across his face, forehead, nose, cheeks, the back of his neck, and his ears. The sunscreen is white at first, then disappears into his copper-toned skin. Working outdoors in New Mexico sun requires daily sunscreen. He squeezes more and coats his forearms. The tube is well-used, squeezed flat in the middle. A lip balm stick stands beside it on the counter.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, applying sunscreen to face with fingertips, white lotion being rubbed into skin, well-used sunscreen tube, bathroom counter, lip balm nearby, bright bathroom light, morning sun protection routine, construction worker preparing for outdoor work
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, dark room, no sunscreen visible, inappropriate

scenes.title: Opening the Medicine Cabinet
scenes.description: David swings the mirrored medicine cabinet door open, revealing shelves inside. The first aid kit — a white plastic box with a red cross — sits on the middle shelf. Beside it: ibuprofen, adhesive bandages, antibiotic ointment, and Sarah's allergy medicine. The top shelf has children's fever reducer and vitamins for Nathan and Emma. David takes two ibuprofen tablets — a preventive measure for the physical day ahead.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, opening mirrored medicine cabinet in bathroom, white first aid kit with red cross on shelf, bottles of ibuprofen and bandages visible, children's medicine on top shelf, taking two pills, bright bathroom light, practical morning routine, construction worker preparing for physical work
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, dark room, empty cabinet, inappropriate

scenes.title: Evening Teeth Brushing
scenes.description: David brushes his teeth at the bathroom sink with a blue toothbrush. White mint toothpaste foams around his mouth. He watches his reflection — a tired man at the end of a long day, dark brown copper-toned skin, freshly shaved jaw, tired dark brown eyes. He spits, rinses, and sets the toothbrush in the holder. He splashes water on his face one last time and dries with the navy blue towel.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, wearing white t-shirt and gray sweatpants, brushing teeth with blue toothbrush at bathroom sink, white toothpaste foam, tired expression in mirror, evening bathroom routine, bright overhead light, navy blue towel nearby, end of long work day
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, energetic expression, work clothes, dark room, inappropriate

scenes.title: Safety Briefing with Crew
scenes.description: David stands before his crew of eight workers, all in hard hats, safety vests, and work boots, gathered in a semicircle. He holds a clipboard with the day's task list. The crew listens as he assigns tasks — framing walls and setting roof trusses. Behind the group, the house frame casts morning shadows on the sandy dirt. The Sandia Mountains are visible in the background under clear blue sky.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, yellow hard hat, orange safety vest, standing before crew of workers in semicircle, holding clipboard, giving morning safety briefing, all workers in hard hats and safety vests, house frame in background, sandy desert ground, Sandia Mountains under clear blue sky, bright morning sun, construction foreman leadership
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor scene, office, alone, no crew, inappropriate

scenes.title: Using the Circular Saw
scenes.description: David picks up the circular saw and sets the blade on the marked line of a 2x4 on the sawhorses. He squeezes the trigger and the blade spins, cutting into the wood. Sawdust sprays in a golden stream. The extension cord stretches to the generator. His right foot is forward, left hand steadies the board, safety glasses protect his eyes. The cut is clean and straight. The waste piece drops to the ground.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, yellow hard hat, orange safety vest, safety glasses, using circular saw to cut 2x4 lumber on sawhorses, golden sawdust spraying from cut, extension cord to generator, tan cargo pants, work boots, tool belt, bright morning sun, construction site, desert landscape background
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor scene, no safety gear, hand saw, inappropriate

scenes.title: Using the Nail Gun
scenes.camera_view: at wall frame on ground, close-up
scenes.description: David picks up the pneumatic nail gun — heavy orange-and-black tool connected to an air compressor by a coiled hose. He positions it at the joint where a stud meets the top plate, presses firmly, and squeezes the trigger. A sharp BANG drives the nail through the wood. He fires a second nail beside the first. Sawdust and wood chips jump with each shot. The wall frame lies flat on the ground, studs spaced evenly.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, yellow hard hat, orange safety vest, safety glasses, firing pneumatic nail gun at wooden wall frame on ground, orange and black nail gun, coiled hose to air compressor, wood studs and top plate, sawdust flying, bright morning sun, construction site, building a house
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor scene, no safety gear, hand nailing, inappropriate

scenes.title: Checking the Level
scenes.description: Close-up of David holding a three-foot yellow level against the vertical face of a wall stud. The level's bubble vial shows the air bubble floating perfectly between two black lines — the wall is plumb. David's dark brown eyes focus on the bubble through his safety glasses. The yellow hard hat brim casts a shadow across his forehead. Behind the level, the raw pine wood grain of the stud is visible. He nods and moves to check the next stud.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, close-up of 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, yellow hard hat, safety glasses, holding yellow three-foot level against wooden wall stud, bubble perfectly centered in vial, focused dark brown eyes, checking if wall is plumb, raw pine wood grain visible, bright sunlight, construction quality control, skilled tradesman
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, indoor scene, no level tool, digital tool, inappropriate

scenes.title: Standing Back to Assess Progress
scenes.description: David stands at the edge of the construction site, arms crossed, looking at the house taking shape. Framed walls on three sides, partial plywood sheathing on the west wall, roof trusses spanning the top. His orange safety vest is bright against the sandy desert and blue sky. The Sandia Mountains rise behind the house frame — the small human-built structure against the ancient geological formation. A moment of satisfaction. They are building someone's home.
scenes.prompt: anime illustration, masterpiece, best quality, 35-year-old Native American man with dark brown copper-toned skin, short black hair, yellow hard hat, orange safety vest, standing at edge of construction site, arms crossed, looking at house frame with walls and roof trusses, partial plywood sheathing, sandy desert ground, Sandia Mountains rising in background, vast blue sky, bright sunlight, construction foreman surveying work, sense of pride and accomplishment
scenes.negative_prompt: photorealistic, photo, realistic, 3d render, low quality, worst quality, finished house, city background, no mountains, rainy, inappropriate
